short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces exotic and frustrating vacation photos of friends with Potatoes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are also frustrated by distracting photos of facebook friends from different vacations around the world while you are working your *** off, THIS APP IS PERFECT FOR YOU.
With a link of a button - switch all vacation photos of your friends to photos of potatoes.
Works with facebook image recognation treasure words.

Just press the extension button, then the Start button and all the annoying photos will be replaced.

icon design credit - Elad Feldman, MotionDesign.elad@gmail.com
Developer's contact info - Raviv.rachmiel@gmail.com

Enjoy :)
